name: Neverfull MM Monogram
description: Iconic tote bag in classic Monogram canvas with versatile design. Features removable pouch and textile lining.
care_instructions: Keep dry. Clean with soft, slightly damp cloth. Store in dust bag.
story: The Neverfull, introduced in 2007, has become one of Louis Vuitton's most successful designs.
meta_title: Louis Vuitton Neverfull MM Monogram - Classic Tote
meta_description: Versatile Louis Vuitton Neverfull MM tote in iconic Monogram canvas

name: Speedy Bandoulière 25
description: Compact handbag in Damier Azur canvas with detachable strap. Features top zip closure and interior pocket.
care_instructions: Avoid contact with water. Store in dust bag. Clean with soft cloth.
story: The Speedy, created in 1930, was Louis Vuitton's first handbag design.
meta_title: Louis Vuitton Speedy Bandoulière 25 - Luxury Handbag
meta_description: Classic Louis Vuitton Speedy with detachable strap in Damier Azur canvas

name: Petite Malle Monogram
description: Miniature trunk-inspired evening bag with Monogram canvas and metallic hardware. Features chain strap.
care_instructions: Handle with care. Store in original box. Professional cleaning recommended.
story: Inspired by Louis Vuitton's heritage in trunk-making since 1854.
meta_title: Louis Vuitton Petite Malle - Evening Bag
meta_description: Elegant miniature trunk evening bag in Monogram canvas with chain strap

name: Keepall Bandoulière 55
description: Spacious travel bag in Monogram Eclipse canvas with leather trim. Features detachable shoulder strap.
care_instructions: Clean with damp cloth. Store stuffed to maintain shape.
story: The Keepall, introduced in 1930, remains the ultimate luxury travel companion.
meta_description: Iconic Louis Vuitton Keepall travel bag in Monogram Eclipse canvas

name: Pochette Métis
description: Structured crossbody bag in Monogram Empreinte leather with distinctive S-lock closure.
care_instructions: Protect from rain. Store in dust bag. Regular leather care advised.
story: A modern interpretation of the classic briefcase design.
meta_title: Louis Vuitton Pochette Métis - Designer Crossbody
meta_description: Elegant Louis Vuitton crossbody in Monogram Empreinte leather
